GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
drm/mcde: Fix refcount leak in mcde_dsi_bind

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit f57699a9b66ea11f000f56d1f1179059239b8690, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit 5fc537bfd00033a3f813330175f7f12c25957ebf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/mcde: Fix refcount leak in mcde_dsi_bind
